description.value: IPS Pathology observation coded results GPS value set. The codes from the SNOMED International Global Patient Set (GPS) subset of SNOMED CT that are included in: all descendants of 106253005 |Histologic grading differentiation AND/OR behavior (qualifier value)|, all descendants of 373369003 |Finding of histologic grading differentiation AND/OR behavior (finding)|, all descendants of 399981008 |Neoplasm and/or hamartoma (disorder)|.
